Leisure

Our teams thrive on working on these exciting projects & pride ourselves on the positive results we achieve.

Tech Dec understands the importance of continuously reinventing businesses in this sector.

We see that attracting new customers and retaining your existing ones is crucial and so we know updating your image regularly is important in doing this.

Whether it is moving premises or changing colour schemes, having a fresh new look will inspire and motivate those who visit to continue visiting.

Over the past few years, Tech Dec have undergone projects which have included total transformations and rebrands of buildings.

This is including all internal decoration from painting to contract wall-coverings being applied.

Also, as part of the transformation, we have applied industrial coatings to the externals, changing the entire colour of the building to suit company branding.

Our teams thrive on working on these exciting projects and pride ourselves on the positive results we achieve. With our knowledge and flexibility, we can meet the needs of our customersâ€™ expectations.

What We Do

  • Design, plan and deliver
  • Work alongside designers to build specifications for your projects
  • Maintain regular communication with clients/principle contractors
  • Ensuring all staff are competent and up to date with all relevant certifications
  • Ensuring all deadlines are met
  • Constant reviews of risk assessments and method statements making sure members of the public and staff are always safe.
  • Quality checks throughout projects
